string-array.name: citisDictionary
string-array.item: Winterfell:Winter is coming:R.drawable.winterfell:White dwellers is coming
Sun Spire:Winter is in the North:R.drawable.sunspear:We have a summer now
Pike:Weather is bad again:R.drawable.pike:We have a storm again
Wall:Winter is here:R.drawable.wall:White dwellers is here!!!!
